title: Game Keeps Minimizing
body:
Yesterday I had an issue with League where I would get to the loading screen and then my game would crash. I restarted my computer and after some lengthy updates I am no longer able to play in full screen mode. Every few seconds my game minimizes, I am able to play on borderless mode, but it makes my game lag, and sometimes my mouse shows up on my other monitor, or it clicks through league, really screwing up my game play. Has anyone had this issue before? How did you fix it?

Windows does not seem to be minimizing any other fullscreen applications.

replies.body:
League could be having an issue interacting with your Graphics Card. There could be a number of other system power settings that could be contributing to this as well, so I recommend working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable results with this.
